comment:
As a wise man once said, "If perfection on the palate exists, this is it."  

It is hard to find something else to say.  This complex and delicate dram will blow you away with its boldness and finesse.  Strong peaty nose turns somersaults of salt, caramel, and that hint of tar before the long glorious ride into the sunset.

I literally shed a tear with the knowledge that I may never see another bottle. If you finds one, cherish it.
@O'Kees. Vooral water en rook. Mist de power van de 10. Wordt naarmate de dram wel iets beter.

First time, in 2003, tasted at a party,best Scotch ever , 
     Amazing taste and smokiness
Smoke on the palate, and long full smoky finish.
However, when I bought a bottle was Not quite as amazing…
price Also from 2003

Nose = fruit and complex. Palate & finish = fruity, savory, smooth, & mild spice. Very drinkable and not much peat for an Ardbeg. This is an elegant and classic whisky that will ALWAYS satisfy your whisky taste buds no matter what time of day :)

Really a shock to the system! Delicate and refined - quiet peat that allows the sweetness of the grain to shine through. Vanilla on the nose and palate, progressing into dark fruits. The finish concludes with melon and ripened fruit.
